title: New: Alice Jemima – Million Dollar Man (Lana Del Rey Cover)
content:
The world would be a much better place if it was illegal to record anything other than Lana Del Rey covers or remixes… or something like that.

Anyway, Devon songstress Alice Jemima has been on my radar for a few months now, however for some reason I never got round to actually writing about her music. With her latest outing, a cover of LDR’s Million Dollar Man, she showcases just how promising a talent she is. Gone are the lush orchestral sections, replaced by the fragile vocals of Jemima and sparse instrumentation, completing one of the finest covers you’ll hear this year. I think I’ve got a crush.

Check out Million Dollar Man below, as well as recent single All The Boyfriends.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
